thread.title: See the changes made at Gitmo
thread.title_full: See the changes made at Gitmo

author: William A.
title: See the changes made at Gitmo
text:
See the changes made at Gitmo Posted at 7:02   William A.   
This happened on Saturday: A sailor posts President Donald Trump's photo inside the headquarters of US Navy base Guantanamo Bay, Cuba. Navy handout photo. #quarterdeck pic.twitter.com/UI4brTC7Jk 
— Carol Rosenberg (@carolrosenberg) January 22, 2017 Heading back to #Guantanamo tomorrow for the first post-Trump hearings in the 9/11 case. Yup, it's still open & trial hasn't started yet. pic.twitter.com/PPbjcxUUHE 
— Michelle Shephard (@shephardm) January 22, 2017 
Just on time for this: Getting ready… 
— Carol Rosenberg (@carolrosenberg) January 22, 2017 
Previously on Twitchy: Perfect! Obama will NOT like Sen. Tim Scott’s reply to his final call to close Gitmo https://t.co/ZDq2ZcBrTW
